articles.title: Zepto, a 10-minute delivery app, raises $665M at $3.6B valuation - TechCrunch
articles.description: Zepto, an Indian quick commerce startup, has more than doubled its valuation to $3.6 billion in a new funding round of $665 million.
articles.content: Zepto has raised a massive $665 million in a new round of funding, more than doubling its valuation to $3.6 billion from $1.4 billion in less than a year, as the Mumbai-based startup doubles down on … [+4787 chars]
